id: This is an automatic mail, please do not reply
translation: This is an automatic mail, please do not reply

thank you for joining our Subscription trial program.

Your trial subscription will expire in 2 weeks, we hope that everything is still up and running!

If you need help, remember to join our vibrant Community

路 Would you like to secure your installation thanks to stable repositories?
路 Do you want to sponsor the NethServer project?

Click on the button below and buy a subscription:

your trial subscription will expire in 1 week.

If you are enjoining it and you want to still have access to stable repositories, buy a subscription clicking the button below:

your trial subscription will expire tomorrow!

After subscription expiration, the server will not be able to download updates.

If you want to leave the subscription program, remember to unregister your machine following the documentation.

Otherwise, if you are still interested in accessing the stable repositories, buy a subscription now by clicking the button below:

your {{.Subscription}} subscription will expire in 1 week.

If you are enjoying it and you want to still have access to stable repositories, renew your subscription clicking the button below:

your {{.Subscription}} subscription will expire tomorrow!

If you want to leave the subscription program, remember to unregister your machine following the documentation.

Hi,
thank you for joining our Subscription trial program.

Your trial subscription will expire in 2 weeks, we hope that everything is still up and running!

If you need help, remember to join our vibrant community at: https://community.nethserver.org

路 Would you like to secure your installation thanks to stable repositories?
路 Do you want to sponsor the NethServer project?

Click on the button below and buy a subscription:

Hi,
your trial subscription will expire in 1 week.

If you are enjoining it and you want to still have access to stable repositories, buy a subscription clicking the button below:

Hi,
your trial subscription will expire tomorrow!

After subscription expiration, the server will not be able to download updates.

If you want to leave the subscription program, remember to unregister your machine following the documentation at: https://docs.nethserver.org/en/v7/subscription.html#removing-a-subscription.

Otherwise, if you are still interested in accessing the stable repositories, buy a subscription now by clicking the button below:

Hi {{.Name}},
your {{.Subscription}} subscription will expire in 1 week.

If you are enjoining it and you want to still have access to stable repositories, renew your subscription clicking the button below:

Hi {{.Name}},
your {{.Subscription}} subscription will expire tomorrow!

After subscription expiration, the server will not be able to download updates.

If you want to leave the subscription program, remember to unregister your machine following the documentation at: https://docs.nethserver.org/en/v7/subscription.html#removing-a-subscription.

Otherwise, if you are still interested in accessing the stable repositories, renew your subscription now by clicking the button below:

Still convinced to not buy a subscription? Tell us why and how can we improve our offer!

Thank you,
NethServer Subscription team
